about_the_game:
Enhance your Kingdom Come: Deliverance II experience with the expansion pass.

Continue your adventure with three major story expansions coming post-launch. Plus, on day one, receive the Shields of Season Passing, featuring 4 unique shield designs.

Brushes With Death
Help a mysterious artist with an enigmatic past.

Legacy of the Forge
Restore Kuttenberg’s forge and become a master blacksmith.

Mysteria Ecclesiae
Explore Sedletz Monastery to stop the spreading of a deadly illness.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains frequent depictions of violence, killing, brutality and blood. Furthermore coarse language and crude humor is used in an extensive manner. The player will further come across adult themes, alcohol as well as sexual activity and nudity.
